amendment.description: Page 64, line 1, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $250,000,000)". Page 67, line 20, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $250,000,000)". Page 67, line 22, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $250,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase the Clean Water State Revolving fund by $250 million, maintaining fiscal year 2016 levels to preserve critical water infrastructure funding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Katko amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Katko amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A071) offered by Mr. Katko.
